summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender regarding a team working in New York on a 'Psychological Reconstruction' project, requesting that another staff member join the team to assist with on-site work and report production. The document's connection to the Epstein case is unclear from the provided text.
keyFacts: The email is dated August 14, 2019, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The subject references 'MCC Psychological Reconstruction', which may refer to the Metropolitan Correctional Center where Epstein died.
The email discusses a team working in New York on detailed work, with a request to add another staff member for expertise.
The sender and recipients are not named in the provided text.
The purpose appears to be coordinating personnel for a project potentially related to the Epstein case or the MCC facility.
